radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The initially unfused epiphyses began to close after 3 months and were almost completely closed after 6 months.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Bone density increased from 52 mg/cm3 to 83 mg/cm3 after 6 months.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Bone mineral density of the lumbar spine was 0.971 g/cm2 (normal range, > 1.150).
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Bone mineral density increased from 0.971 g/cm2 to 1.043 g/cm2 after 6 months.
